{"id":1316837581,"question_id":724,"lang":"rust","lang_name":"Rust","time":"2 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1720641018,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1316837581/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"2.2 MB","code":"impl Solution {\n    pub fn pivot_index(nums: Vec<i32>) -> i32 {\n        let sum = nums.iter().sum::<i32>();\n        let mut left_sum = 0;\n\n        for (i, v) in nums.iter().enumerate() {\n            if left_sum * 2 + v == sum {\n                return i as i32;\n            }\n            left_sum += v;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
